mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d 09:00:00') AS nextWorkDay FROM t_day WHERE date > #{date} AND date_type = '工作日' LIMIT 1
SELECT id AS id, date AS date, date_type AS dateType, week AS week, default_week AS defaultWeek, operation_week AS operationWeek FROM t_day;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_day( date, date_type, week, default_week, operation_week ) VALUES ( #{date}, #{dateType}, #{week}, #{defaultWeek}, #{operationWeek} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_day SET date = #{date}, date_type = #{dateType}, week = #{week}, default_week = #{defaultWeek}, operation_week = #{operationWeek} WHERE id = #{id}
